page.title: 04Politics
page.content: At the moment the SDP/Liberal Alliance party is gaining popularity and has just (May 1985) gained control of our County Council. In Westminster the Conservative party have problems which affect on Avon. Unemployment is very high. There is insufficient money to fund schools adequately. Schools have to raise 'private' money from parents to buy books and equipment. There is not enough money to build new roads and bypasses, hospitals and prisons. Our country is in an economic decline. We are not as poor as drought stricken African countries. Pop groups work voluntarily to raise millions of pounds to feed the starving. Bob Geldorf, a pop star, embarrassed the government by organising a hugely successful international concert to raise money for starving Ethiopians.
